sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_d2d3d371d0ce301041e00aaa52e2b9e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">12d317712fce3010ce719651cb207700</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>d2d3d371d0ce301041e00aaa52e2b9e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d2d3d371d0ce301041e00aaa52e2b9e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0ed3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Task state update transform</api_name><description>Custom portal - Task state update transform</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Task state update transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "sysId",
    "label": "SysId of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
{
    "name": "state",
    "label": "state of the task",
    "fieldType": "string",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"SysId of the task","comment":""},{"message":"state of the task","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var sys = input.sysId;
	var state = input.state;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
    gr.get(sys);
    gr.setValue('state', state);
    gr.update();

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_52d3d3718ace30108565dfd63cdae5e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>52d3d3718ace30108565dfd63cdae5e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_52d3d3718ace30108565dfd63cdae5e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_9ed3d37188ce301023c601d63812f4e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">1ed3d371d1ce3010a6adf0f72961a7e1</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ed3d37188ce301023c601d63812f4e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9ed3d37188ce301023c601d63812f4e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_composite"><sys_ux_data_broker_composite action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</api_name><data_drivers>{
  "compositeQueryMeta": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "83b97b30773300108d070d74c81061f7",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeQueryMeta",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamDefinitionId" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "evamDefinitionId"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Metadata defining the EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding": {
    "definition" : {
        "id" : "86d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4",
        "type" : "TRANSFORM"
      },
      "elementId" : "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
      "inputValues" : {
        "graphqlData" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "compositeQueryMeta",
              "output"
            ]
          }
        },
        "catalogSysId": {
            "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
            "binding": {
              "address": [
                "catalogSysId"
              ]
            }
        }
      },
      "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"      
  },
  "compositeDataEntities": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "eaafa603773300108d070d74c81061b6",
      "type" : "GRAPHQL"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataEntities",
    "inputValues" : {
      "evamMetadata" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeMetaWithCatalogParameterBinding",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      },
      "pageNumber" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageNumber"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageSize" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageSize"
            ]
          }
      },
      "pageCursor" : {
          "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_INPUT_BINDING",
          "binding": {
            "address": [
              "pageCursor"
            ]
          }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Collated records from EVAM Definition"
  },
  "compositeDataViews": {
    "definition" : {
      "id" : "7b652701773300108d070d74c81061b8",
      "type" : "TRANSFORM"
    },
    "elementId" : "compositeDataViews",
    "inputValues" : {
      "graphqlData" : {
        "type": "BROKER_INTERNAL_STATE_BINDING",
        "binding": {
          "address": [
            "compositeDataEntities",
            "output"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "elementLabel" : "Composite Data as View objects"
  }
}</data_drivers><description>This databroker is similar to "EVAM Data Resource" with an additional capability of dynamic catalogId parmeter binding support. This is a temporary workaround for Quebec (only for related catalog items usecase) and eventually will go away when EVAM supports more generic dynamic paramters binding (to support all usecases) in future release.</description><name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</name><operations/><output_properties>[
 {

    }
  }
]</output_properties><private>false</private><props>[

},
{

},
{

  "label": "Page Size",
  "description": "Page size for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "20"
},
{
  "name": "pageNumber",

  "description": "Page number for EVAM pagination",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "0"
}
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ed3d371face30109f5588a04810b4f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_composite_1ed3d371face30109f5588a04810b4f6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_composite><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1ed3d371face30109f5588a04810b4f6"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c6d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Data row evam broker - My Tasks</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval due: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
					model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Approval overdue: {0}", dueDate);
				}
		}
		model.title = gs.getMessage("Approval Request: {0}", model.title);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null){
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			}
		}
    if(model.model.sys_created_on != null){
			var createdDate = new GlideDate();
			createdDate.setValue(model.model.sys_created_on);
			model.detailValueOne = createdDate.toString();
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>c6d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c6d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c6d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Data row evam broker - My Tasks

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">d6d3d3716dce3010ead588a1855008e1</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ad3d3710bce30105968c5a477592be4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1ad3d3710bce30105968c5a477592be4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event

function handler({

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>setFeedbackReason</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedReasons = [];
    selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id);
    api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>ded3d371c2ce30101be60daa0ab251e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ded3d371c2ce30101be60daa0ab251e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_86d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Transform metadata to add catalog filter</api_name><description>This is an interim way to add dynamic catalog filter before Related catalogs EVAM usecase </description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Transform metadata to add catalog filter</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
    {
        "name": "graphqlData",
        "label": "GraphQL Metadata Response",
        "description": "",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "object",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    },
    {
        "name": "catalogSysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {

	var compositeMetadata = input
		.graphqlData
		.data
		.GlideCompositeDataMetadata_Query
		.getMetadata;
	var END_QUERY = '^EQ';
	var AND = '^';
	compositeMetadata.datasources.map(function(source) {
		if (source.table === 'sc_2_sc') {
			var catalogFilter = 'sc_cat_item=' + input.catalogSysId + END_QUERY;
			source.query = source.query? new String(source.query).replace(END_QUERY, "") + AND + catalogFilter : catalogFilter;
		}
	});
	
	return compositeMetadata;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>86d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Transform metadata to add catalog filter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_86d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=86d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Transform metadata to add catalog filter

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">16d3d37174ce301024343d26478237e4</macroponent><name>handle_facet_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
			facetFilters: event.payload.selectedFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>12d3d37102ce3010320bb9a25199c9e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_facet_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_12d3d37102ce3010320bb9a25199c9e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

	// Called on successful retrieval of search data
    api.setState('loading', false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>92d3d37194ce301012110d9776ae4ce5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set_loading</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_92d3d37194ce301012110d9776ae4ce5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_dad3d371bfce301042ee1b24065caae5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>Update comments</name><required_translations>[ {
  "message" : "Comment deleted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "Comment posted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "message" : "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let done = false;
    let itemPath = [];

    const getPath = (items, pid, level) => {
        for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
            if (!done) {
                itemPath.length = level;

                if (items[i].id == pid) {
                    itemPath.push(i);
                    done = true;
                    return;
                } else {
                    if (items[i].children && items[i].children.length > 0) {
                        itemPath.push(i);
                        getPath(items[i].children, pid, level + 1);
                    }
                }
            } else return;
        }
    };

    const getStringPath = (path, key) => {
        let actualPath = "";

        for (let i = 0; i < path.length - 1; i++) {
            actualPath += `[${path[i]}].children`;
        }

        if (path.length != 0 && key)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}].${key}`;
        else if (path.length != 0)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}]`;

        return actualPath;
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.get()
     */
    const get = (obj, path) => {
        if (!path)
            return undefined;

        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        return (
            pathArray.reduce((prevObj, key) => prevObj && prevObj[key], obj)
        );
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.set()
     */
    const set = (obj, path, value) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (acc[key] === undefined) acc[key] = {};
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) acc[key] = value;
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.unset()
     */
    const unset = (obj, path) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) {
                acc.splice(key, 1);
            }
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    const put = function(obj, path, val) {
        var stringToPath = function(path) {
            if (typeof path !== 'string')
                return path;

            var output = [];

            path.split('.').forEach(function(item, index) {
                item.split(/\[([^}]+)\]/g).forEach(function(key) {
                    if (key.length > 0) {
                        output.push(key);
                    }
                });
            });

            return output;
        };

        path = stringToPath(path);

        var length = path.length;
        var current = obj;

        path.forEach(function(key, index) {
            if (index === length - 1) {
                current[key].unshift(val);
            } else {
                if (!current[key]) {
                    current[key] = {};
                }

                current = current[key];
            }
        });
    };

    if (event.elementId == 'get_article_details_1' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        if (api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.showFeedbackComments) {
            api.setState('articleId', api.context.props.sysId);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'retrieve_knowledge_comments' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.data.retrieve_knowledge_comments.knowledgeComments;

        if (comments) {
            api.setState('comments', comments);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'insert_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let data = JSON.parse(event.payload.data.output.data.AppKnowledge_Mutation.addComment);

        if (data.sys_id) {
            helpers.translate('Comment posted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "submitCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });

            let comment = {
                'id': data.sys_id,
                'parent': data.parent,
                'children': data.children,
                'created': data.created_on,
                'text': data.comment_text,
                'user': {
                    'name': data.user.name,
                    'id': data.user.sys_id,
                    'avatar': data.user.avatar
                },
                'reactionCount': 0,
                'isReacted': false
            };

            let comments = api.state.comments;

            if (comment.parent) {
                getPath(comments, comment.parent, 0);

                if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                    api.setState('comments', []);

                    put(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, 'children'), comment);

                    api.setState('comments', comments);
                    done = false;
                    itemPath = [];
                }
            } else {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                comments.unshift(comment);
                api.setState('comments', comments);
            }
        } else {
            helpers.translate('You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "commentLimitAlert",
                        status: "critical",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'delete_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);
            
            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let index = itemPath[0];

                if (itemPath.length <= 1) {
                    comments.splice(index, 1);
                } else {
                    unset(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, null));
                }

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }

            helpers.translate('Comment deleted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "deleteCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'like_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount + 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, true);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'unlike_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount - 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, false);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>dad3d371bfce301042ee1b24065caae5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_dad3d371bfce301042ee1b24065caae5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Breadcrumb default value","comment":""},{"message":"Display value","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var home = gs.getMessage("Home");
	var homeItem = {"label":home,"icon":"home-outline","hideLabel":false};
    var itemValue = input.displayValue || "";
    return [homeItem , {"label":itemValue}];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Breadcrumbs broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.JobRepository</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Contains function to perform CRUD on job objects</description><name>JobRepository</name><script><![CDATA[var JobRepository = Class.create();
JobRepository.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {
		this.submittedJobsTableName = 'x_661207_proacti_0_proactive_workflows';
	},

    createSubmittedJob: function(sessionId, jobInfo) {
        var now_GR = new GlideRecord(this.submittedJobsTableName);
        now_GR.initialize();
        now_GR.job_id = jobInfo.jobId.id;
        now_GR.status = jobInfo.status;
        now_GR.name = jobInfo.jobId.readableName;
        now_GR.session_id = sessionId;
        now_GR.owner = jobInfo.jobOwner;
        now_GR.submitted_time = jobInfo.submittedTime;
        now_GR.start_time = jobInfo.startTime;
        now_GR.in_error_time = jobInfo.inErrorTime;
        now_GR.finished_time = jobInfo.finishedTime;
        var sysId = now_GR.insert();
        gs.info('Created submitted job record for job ' + jobInfo.jobId.id);
		return sysId;
    },

    updateSubmittedJob: function(sessionId, jobInfo) {
		if (jobInfo) {
			this._executeUpdateQuery(sessionId, jobInfo);
			gs.info('Updated submitted job record for job ' + jobInfo.jobId.id);
		} else {
			gs.error('Could not update job record, jobId is undefined');
		}
    },
	
	_isJobExists: function (jobId) {
		var now_GR = new GlideRecord(this.submittedJobsTableName);
		now_GR.addQuery('job_id', jobInfo.jobId.id);
		now_GR.query();
	},
	
	_executeUpdateQuery: function(sessionId, jobInfo) {
		var now_GR = new GlideRecord(this.submittedJobsTableName);
        now_GR.get('job_id',jobInfo.jobId.id);
        if (now_GR.isValid()) {
			now_GR.status = jobInfo.status;
			now_GR.name = jobInfo.jobId.redeableName;
			now_GR.session_id = sessionId;
			now_GR.owner = jobInfo.jobOwner;
			now_GR.submitted_time = jobInfo.submittedTime;
			now_GR.start_time = jobInfo.startTime;
			now_GR.in_error_time = jobInfo.inErrorTime;
			now_GR.finished_time = jobInfo.finishedTime;
			var isUpdated = now_GR.update();
			if (!isUpdated) {
				gs.error('Job record update failed');
			}
			return isUpdated;
		} else {
			gs.error('Could not update job record, record not found in DB');
		}
	},
	
    type: 'JobRepository'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-14 14:41:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc08fdd22f6230103c5d9facf699b6fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JobRepository</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fc08fdd22f6230103c5d9facf699b6fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-21 22:53:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_52d3d37188ce30101a4e6357d34ff2e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>52d3d37188ce30101a4e6357d34ff2e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_52d3d37188ce30101a4e6357d34ff2e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">12d317712fce3010ce719651cb207700</macroponent><name>Order success redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        payload: params
    } = event;
    const route = "order_success";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ad3d371d0ce3010ec72d8c9e5ccdde5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order success redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9ad3d371d0ce3010ec72d8c9e5ccdde5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c2d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Catalog item variables transform</api_name><description>Used to convert the catalog item variables in label/value pairs</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Catalog item variables transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
        "name": "sysId",
        "label": "Catalog Sys Id",
        "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "string",
        "mandatory": true,
        "defaultValue": ""
    }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related variables for","comment":""},{"message":"Catalog Sys Id","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sc_req_item;
	function block(label,type,value){
		var out = {};
		out.label = label;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
	for(var i = 0; i < modelData._results.length; i++){
		if(modelData._results[i].sys_id.value == input.sysId){
			var modelVariableArray = modelData._results[i].variables;
			for(var x = 0; x < modelVariableArray.variables.length; x++){
				var name =  modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableLabel;
				modelArray.push(block(name, "string", modelVariableArray.variables[x].variableDisplayValue));
			}
		}
	}
	if(modelArray.length > 0)
		return modelArray;
	else{
		var emptylabel = gs.getMessage("No additional details at this time.");
		var emptyvalue = "";
		modelArray.push(block(emptylabel, "string", emptyvalue));
		return modelArray;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>c2d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog item variables transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_c2d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c2d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task rejected">d6d3d37173ce301012ca8c58a76395e5</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>96d3d37119ce3010d74a7be82736c3e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_96d3d37119ce3010d74a7be82736c3e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_ded3d37178ce3010679617f6971874e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>Create knowledge feedback</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        context,
        data,
        state,
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;
    const {
        modal
    } = helpers;
    const insertRecord = function(table, fields, type) {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", type);
        data.create_record_1.execute({
            table,
            templateFields: fields,
            useSetDisplayValue: ''
        });
    };
    var articleSysId = context.props.sysId;
    var templateFields = "article=" + articleSysId + "^";
    var articleData = data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails;
    var yesMessage = "Thank you for your feedback";
    var noMessage = "We'll improve the article based on your feedback.";
    const feedbackAction = state.currentFeedbackAction;

    if (event.elementId == "kb_star_rating") {
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "rating");
        templateFields += "rating=" + event.payload.rating;
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForRating >= event.payload.rating) {
            setState('userRating', event.payload.rating);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "rating");
        }
    }

    if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no") {
        var showModal = (articleData.showFeedbackOptions || articleData.showFeedbackComments) && articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForHelpful;
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        if (showModal) {
            setState('additionalDetails', null);
            setState("selectedReason", ["4"]);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            templateFields += "useful=no";
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_yes") {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        templateFields += "useful=yes";
        setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', yesMessage);
        setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-up-outline');
        setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        const usefulYesCount = articleData.usefulYesCount+1;
        const totalUsefulCount = articleData.totalUsefulCount+1;
        var helpPercent = (usefulYesCount && totalUsefulCount) ? 
            Math.round(usefulYesCount / totalUsefulCount *100) : 0;
        const helpPercentMessage = (helpPercent) ? helpPercent+'% found this helpful':'';
        setState('helpPercentMessage',helpPercentMessage);
        setState('isHelpPercentInfoHidden', false);
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_ignore") {

        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "reason=4^useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "reason=4^rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);

    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_submit") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if ((state.selectedReason)[0] != null)
            templateFields += "reason=" + (state.selectedReason)[0] + "^";
        if (state.additionalDetails != null)
            templateFields += "comments=" + state.additionalDetails + "^";
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);
    } else if (event.elementId == "flag_article") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_2']");
        var comments = state.flagArticleContent.replaceAll("\n", "\\n").replaceAll("^", "^");
        templateFields += "flagged=true^comments=" + comments;
        setState('flagArticleContent', comments);
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForFlag)
            templateFields += "^reason=Flagged";
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "flag_article");
    }

    if (event.elementId == "create_record_1") {
        var items = [];
        var requestFailed = false;
		
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED") {
            var output = event.payload.data.output.data.GlideRecord_Mutation.insert_kb_feedback;
            if (output == null) {
                requestFailed = true;
            } else {
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "flag_article") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "flagArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Article has been flagged",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "rating") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "ratingArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "boolean_feedback") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "booleanFeedbackSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: "Feedback submitted.",
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
            }
        }
        
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_FAILED" || requestFailed) {
            items.push({
                id: "flagArticleFailure",
                status: "critical",
                icon: "info-circle-outline",
                content: "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
                action: {
                    type: "dismiss"
                }
            });
        }
        if (items.length > 0) {
            emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                items
            });
        }
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "");
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>ded3d37178ce3010679617f6971874e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create knowledge feedback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ded3d37178ce3010679617f6971874e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_82d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Data row evam broker - My Requests</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]
</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		var currDate = new GlideDate();
		var dueDate = new GlideDate();
		var price = model.model.price;
		dueDate.setValue(model.model.due_date);
		if(model.model.table == "sc_req_item"){
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
			if(model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
				model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
			if(price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null )
				model.subtitle = " ";
		}
		else{
			if(model.model.due_date != ""){
				model.highlightedHeaderLabel = gs.getMessage("Completion date: {0}", dueDate);
				if(currDate.getDisplayValue() > dueDate.getDisplayValue()){
					model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>82d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - My Requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_82d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=82d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5"/></record_update>

   {
      "name":"sysId",
      "fieldType":"string",
      "label":"Sys ID",
      "interfaceApiName":null,
      "typeMetadata":null,
      "mandatory":false,
      "readOnly":false
   },
    {
      "name":"table",
      "fieldType":"string",
      "label":"Table",
      "interfaceApiName":null,
      "typeMetadata":null,
      "mandatory":false,

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_92d3d3715bce3010d68f62a76e80e3e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>Toggle Comment Reaction</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, imports }) {
  var likeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "like_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  var unlikeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "unlike_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  if (event.payload.reaction) {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", likeCommentPayload);
  } else {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", unlikeCommentPayload);
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>1.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>92d3d3715bce3010d68f62a76e80e3e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Comment Reaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_92d3d3715bce3010d68f62a76e80e3e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Image for record header</api_name><description>Used to fetch the image from a cat item to a record header</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Image for record header</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var model = {};
    var modelData = input.catBroker.picture.displayValue;
    if(modelData != undefined){
		model.headerImage = modelData;
		model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
	}
    return model;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Content set - Related items list</api_name><description>Used to convert the evam data to required content set format in the related items section of the catalog page of custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Content set - Related items list</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "evambroker",
    "label": "broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.evambroker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.evambroker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
			model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>0ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Content set - Related items list</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_0ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e4840a9a2f6230103c5d9facf699b68b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.OutboundRestService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Holds utility functions to send outbound HTTP requests</description><name>OutboundRestService</name><script><![CDATA[var OutboundRestService = Class.create();
OutboundRestService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    executeOutboundRestMsg: function(proactiveUrl, sessionId, outboundRestMessageName, httpMethodVariables, queryParams) {
		
		if (!sessionId || sessionId.length <= 0) {
            gs.error('Cannot send request '+ outboundRestMessageName + '. Parameter "sessionid" is null');    
			return;
		}
		
		if (!proactiveUrl || proactiveUrl.length <= 0) {
			gs.error('Cannot send request '+ outboundRestMessageName + '. Parameter "proactive_url" URL is null');
			return;
		}
		
        try {
            var restMsg = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_661207_proacti_0.ProActive Scheduler', outboundRestMessageName);

				// TODO supp com
                gs.info("HTTPMETHOD VARIABLES: " + JSON.stringify(httpMethodVariables));
				
				if (typeof httpMethodVariables == "string") {
					try {
						httpMethodVariables = JSON.parse(httpMethodVariables);
					} catch (ex) {
						gs.error('Could not send '+outboundRestMessageName+' request.\n RestMessage parameters does not have a valid JSON format \n'+ ex.message);
						throw ex;
					}
				}

                for (var key in httpMethodVariables) {
                    restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape(key, httpMethodVariables[key]);
                }
			
			
			if (queryParams) {
				// TODO supp com
                gs.info("QUERY PARAMS: " + JSON.stringify(queryParams));
				
				if (typeof queryParams == "string") {
					try {
						queryParams = JSON.parse(queryParams);
					} catch (ex) {
						gs.error('Could not send '+outboundRestMessageName+' request. Query params does not have a valid JSON format: '+ ex.message);
						throw ex;
					}
				}
				
                for (var key in queryParams) {
                    restMsg.setQueryParameter(key, queryParams[key]);
                }
            }
			
			// Finally add the Proactive URL and the sessionId to the rest message
			restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape("session_id", sessionId);
			restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape("proactive_url", proactiveUrl);

            //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID
            //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');

            //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either
            //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor
            //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null
            //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);

            return restMsg.execute();
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.info('Exception occured trying to send outbound HTTP request ' + ex.message);
            return;
        }
    },

    getSessionId: function(proactiveUrl, params) {
        if (!proactiveUrl || proactiveUrl.trim().length === 0) {
            gs.error('ProActive URL can\'t be empty to get sessionId');
			return;
        }
        if (params.username == undefined || params.username.trim().length === 0) {
            gs.error('ProActive username can\'t be empty to get sessionId');
			return;
        }

        if (params.password == undefined || params.password.trim().length === 0) {
            gs.error('ProActive password can\'t be empty to get sessionId');
			return;
        }
	
        try {
            var restMsg = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_661207_proacti_0.ProActive Scheduler', 'Login');
            restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape('proactive_url', proactiveUrl);
            restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape('username', params.username);
            restMsg.setStringParameterNoEscape('password', params.password);

            //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID
            //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');

            //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either
            //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor
            //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null
            //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);

            var response = restMsg.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

            if (httpStatus != 200) {
                gs.info('Could not login to ProActive. Return code: ' + httpStatus + '.\nError message: ' + responseBody.errorMessage, 'source');
                return;
            }
            
            return responseBody;
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.info('Exception occured trying to login to ProActive with message: ' + ex.message);
        }
    },
    type: 'OutboundRestService'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-14 15:35:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>e4840a9a2f6230103c5d9facf699b68b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OutboundRestService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e4840a9a2f6230103c5d9facf699b68b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-04 22:45:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>Show Submit Comment Alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "submitCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment posted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>12d3d37155ce3010c053f4f97f0153e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Submit Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_12d3d37155ce3010c053f4f97f0153e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_92d3d371f6ce3010f90ebeb4fa3596e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>On search </name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {

    const {
        searchContextConfigId,
        searchTerm
    } = event.payload;
    
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route: "search",
        fields: {
            searchContextConfigId,
            searchTerm
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>92d3d371f6ce3010f90ebeb4fa3596e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_92d3d371f6ce3010f90ebeb4fa3596e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>Launch reject alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>ded3d3712cce3010145d47da2d9c40f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch reject alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ded3d3712cce3010145d47da2d9c40f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Hide data rows</api_name><description>This is used to hide the data row with no cards on the custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Hide data rows</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
 {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.items;
	if(modelData.length == 0)
		return true;
	else
		return false;
}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>5ed3d3719cce3010eb95067495a633e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5ed3d3719cce3010eb95067495a633e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
       const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d6d3d3715cce3010666ded56606b64e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch approve alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d6d3d3715cce3010666ded56606b64e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Data row evam broker - Updated articles</api_name><description>Used to transform EVAM data to fit design of custom portal data row cards.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "EVAM Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"EVAM Broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	for(var i = 0; i < input.broker.items.length; i++){
		var model = input.broker.items[i].propValues;
		if(model.model.rating != ""){
			model.detailValueTwo = gs.getMessage("{0} out of 5", model.detailValueTwo);
		}
	}
	return input;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Data row evam broker - Updated articles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5"/></record_update>
