sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">12d3d37107ce3010f7cb43877c5a8ae4</macroponent><name>Show Delete Comment Alert</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment deleted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>56d3d37105ce3010c9c4035a1df726e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Delete Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_56d3d37105ce3010c9c4035a1df726e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_d2d3d37100ce30104e60ae7af4b784e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">16d3d37174ce301024343d26478237e4</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>1.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d2d3d37100ce30104e60ae7af4b784e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d2d3d37100ce30104e60ae7af4b784e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_02d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Boolean reversal transform</api_name><description>Required because the buttons prop is true to disable and false to enable, and also to fetch the Custom portal settings page text</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Boolean reversal transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "broker",
    "label": "GraphQL Broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"GraphQL Broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	var modelData = input.broker.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
	var mfa = {};
	if(modelData == "false"){
		mfa.value = "true";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance.");
	}
	else{
		mfa.value = "false";
		mfa.text = gs.getMessage("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below");
	}
	return mfa;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>02d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Boolean reversal transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_02d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=02d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_ced3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Catalog item from RITM</api_name><description>Created to fetch the catalog item a particular RITM is carrying.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Catalog item from RITM</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "ritmbroker",
    "label": "RITM broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task Approved">5ed3d37142ce301044ce478c257df8e5</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ed3d37132ce301044ba82f6efa225e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1ed3d37132ce301044ba82f6efa225e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_9ad3d37191ce30107281fab7482d3be4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">5ed3d371d1ce30109ab3a194530e13ff</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ad3d37191ce30107281fab7482d3be4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9ad3d37191ce30107281fab7482d3be4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">16d3d37174ce301024343d26478237e4</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>5ad3d371c0ce3010315bfbcabf6a46e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5ad3d371c0ce3010315bfbcabf6a46e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:30</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Heading for record page</api_name><description>Heading for record page (Request) on custom portal</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Heading for record page</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[ {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "lookup record broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"lookup record broker","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	var table = input.table;
	var modelData = input.catBroker;
	
	var shortDescription = modelData.short_description && modelData.short_description.displayValue;
	var catalogItem = modelData.cat_item && modelData.cat_item.displayValue;
	
	if(table == "sc_req_item"){
			return {
			"title": catalogItem,
			"subtitle": shortDescription
		};
	}else{
		return {
			"title": shortDescription,
			"subtitle": catalogItem
		};
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Heading for record page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=42d3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_52d3d371e7ce30108b23610c1e9c90e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">16d3d37174ce301024343d26478237e4</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>52d3d371e7ce30108b23610c1e9c90e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_52d3d371e7ce30108b23610c1e9c90e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_graphql"><sys_ux_data_broker_graphql action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Fetch catalog item variables</api_name><description>Used to fetch the 'variables' of a particular catalog item</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Fetch catalog item variables</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
{
  "name": "sysId",
  "label": "Cat Item id",
  "description": "Get variables for catalog item",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
}
]</props><query>query($sysId: String) {
  GlideRecord_Query {
    sc_req_item(queryConditions: $sysId) {
      _results {
        sys_id {
          value
        }
        variables {
          variables {
            variableLabel
            variableDisplayValue
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}</query><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[(function buildQuery(query, inputs) { 
         var qb = new GraphQLQueryBuilder(query, inputs);
   // return appropriate query here
    return qb; 
   })(query, inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>5ed3d371dcce3010cde5def92ac0daf6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item variables</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_graphql_5ed3d371dcce3010cde5def92ac0daf6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:33</sys_updated_on><type>query</type></sys_ux_data_broker_graphql><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5ed3d371dcce3010cde5def92ac0daf6"/></record_update>

    "description": "Sys Id of sc_request table"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Sys Id of sc_request table","comment":""},{"message":"Sys Id","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var requestSysId = input.sysId || "";
    if (requestSysId !== "") {
        var request = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
        request.addQuery('request', requestSysId);
        request.query();
        if (request.next()) {
            return {
				"table" : "sc_req_item",
				"sysId" : request.getUniqueValue(),
				"number" : request.getValue("number")
			};
        }
    }
    return;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>cad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request Item Data Broker</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_cad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_1ad3d37166ce30106249f4db8977d6e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">1ed3d3711fce301000a6891de16619e4</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.request_item_data_broker_1.output.sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ad3d37166ce30106249f4db8977d6e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1ad3d37166ce30106249f4db8977d6e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_96d3d3719fce301097bd5ecbbf06ace4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">52d3d3711cce301027bb7ce2822429e1</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>96d3d3719fce301097bd5ecbbf06ace4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_96d3d3719fce301097bd5ecbbf06ace4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Display value block transform</api_name><description>This is used to transform the server fetched data into label value pairs to be displayed by the 'display value block' component</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Display value block transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "catBroker",
    "label": "catalog item broker",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Table",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "Logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "requested",
    "label": "Requested For",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Table","comment":""},{"message":"Requested For","comment":""},{"message":"Logged in user","comment":""},{"message":"Graphql Query Output","comment":""},{"message":"catalog item broker","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = input.catBroker;
    var table = input.table;
    var user = input.user;
    var requestedFor = input.requested;
    function block(label, type, value) {
        var out = {};
		var labelNew = gs.getMessage("{0}", label);
		out.label = labelNew;
		var outval = {};
		outval.type = type;
		outval.value = value;
		out.value = outval;
		return out;
	}
    function getDate(item) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            var itemDate = new GlideDate();
            itemDate.setValue(item.displayValue);
			item.displayValue = itemDate.getValue();
            return item;
        }
    }
    function addToModel(item, label) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));
        }
    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {
            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");
        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");
        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};
        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {
            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");
    } else if (table === 'incident') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");
        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");
        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");
        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");
    } else {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
    }

	addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");
    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");
    return modelArray;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>8ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display value block transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_8ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:28</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8ad3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_12d3d3712cce30107836046fc0e6f8f3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">1ed3d3711fce301000a6891de16619e4</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>12d3d3712cce30107836046fc0e6f8f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_12d3d3712cce30107836046fc0e6f8f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:34</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">16d3d37174ce301024343d26478237e4</macroponent><name>handle_tab_filter_click</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: event.payload.selectedFilter,
			facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		},
		false,
    false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>92d3d371d6ce301017cdf773c0559df3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_tab_filter_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_92d3d371d6ce301017cdf773c0559df3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:29</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_dad3d371e4ce3010fb7f37618d04a3e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">1ed3d3711fce301000a6891de16619e4</macroponent><name>Refresh submitted screen</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId,
        number
    } = api.context.props;
    if(table !== "sc_request"){
        api.setState("successNumber",number);
        api.setState("successSysId",sysId);
    }else{
        api.setState("requestSysId",sysId);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>dad3d371e4ce3010fb7f37618d04a3e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_dad3d371e4ce3010fb7f37618d04a3e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4ed3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.Get approver sysId</api_name><description>Used to fetch sysId from sysapproval_approver table for relevant task record</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Get approver sysId</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "number",
    "label": "Number on record",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
  },
 {
    "name": "user",
    "label": "SysID of the logged in user",
    "fieldType": "json",
    "valueType": "object",
    "readOnly": false,
    "mandatory": true,
    "description": "Graphql Query Output"
   }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input){
	try{
		var user_id = input.user;
		var record_id = input.number;
		var target = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
		target.addQuery("sysapproval",record_id);
		target.addQuery("approver", user_id);
		target.query(); 
		if (target.next()) { 
			return target.getUniqueValue();
		}
	}catch(e){}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ed3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get approver sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_4ed3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-19 11:32:31</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4ed3d3712fce30103c5d9facf699b6c4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fe2508062f4270103c5d9facf699b647
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.SchedulerClient</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Class that provides functions to interact with the Scheduler of a ProActive server using REST messages</description><name>SchedulerClient</name><script><![CDATA[var SchedulerClient = Class.create();
SchedulerClient.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function() {
        this.jobRepository = new JobRepository();
        this.outboundRestService = new OutboundRestService();
        this.threadUtils = new global.ThreadUtils();
    },

    getSessionId: function(proactiveUrl, userName, pwd) {
        var params = {
            "username": userName,
            "password": pwd
        };
        return this.outboundRestService.getSessionId(proactiveUrl, params);
    },

    restartInErrorTasks: function(jobId) {
        if (!jobId) {
            gs.error('Could not restart in error tasks of ProActive job. ' + jobId + ' is undefined ');
            return;
        }
        var response = this.outboundRestService.executeOutboundRestMsg('Restart all in error tasks', {
            'jobId': jobId
        });

        if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
            return waitForTerminalStatus(sessionId, jobInfo);
        } else {
            gs.error('Could not restart in error tasks of ProActive job ' + jobId + ':\nResponse code: ' + response.getStatusCode + '\nMessage: ' + response.getBody());
        }
    },

    submitJobFromCatalog: function(proactiveUrl, sessionId, bucket, workflow, workflowVariables, genericInfos) {

        var requestVariables = {
            'bucket': bucket,
            'workflow': workflow,
            'variables': workflowVariables
        };

        try {
            var response = this.outboundRestService.executeOutboundRestMsg(proactiveUrl, sessionId, 'Submit job from catalog', requestVariables, genericInfos);
        } catch (e) {
            gs.error(e.name + ' occured trying to submit job from catalog with message: \n' + e.message);
            return;
        }

        var jsonBody = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var jobInfo = this.getJobInfo(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jsonBody.id);

        if (response.getStatusCode() != 200) {
            gs.error('Could not submit ProActive job from url \n' + response.getBody());
            return;
        }

        //gs.info('jsonBody = ' + JSON.stringify(jsonBody));
        //gs.info('jobInfo = ' + JSON.stringify(jobInfo));
        this.jobRepository.createSubmittedJob(sessionId, jobInfo);
        //this.waitForTerminalStatus(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jobInfo);

        return jsonBody;
    },

    submitJobFromFile: function(sessionId, workflowName, variables) {
        if (sessionId == undefined || sessionId.trim().length === 0) {
            gs.error('You need to login to ProActive first');
            return;
        };

        if (workflowName == undefined || workflowName.trim().length === 0) {
            gs.error('ProActive Workflow name can\'t be empty');
            return;
        };

        // Get workflow data from DB that corresponds to the workflow name
        var workflowSysId = new global.GlideQuery('x_661207_proacti_0_workflow')
            .where('name', workflowName)
            .selectOne('sys_id');

        if (workflowSysId.isPresent()) {
            var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
            var attachmentContent;
            // Retrieve attachment from DB
            var agr = attachment.getAttachments('ZZ_YYx_661207_proacti_0_workflow', workflowSysId.get().sys_id);
            if (agr.next()) {
                // Fetch content of workflow file
                attachmentContent = attachment.getContent(agr);
                // Add file content to variables
                var requestVariables = {
                    'workflow': attachmentContent,
                    'variables': variables
                };
                var response = this.outboundRestService.executeOutboundRestMsg(sessionId, 'Submit job from file', requestVariables);
                if (response.getStatusCode() != 200) {
                    gs.error('Could not submit job from file \nResponse code: ' + response.getStatusCode + '\nMessage: ' + response.getBody());
                    return;
                }
                return JSON.parse(response.getBody());
            } else {
                gs.info("Not attachment found for ProActive workflow " + workflowName + " with sysid " + workflowSysId);
                return;
            }
        } else {
            gs.info("There is no ProActive workflow named: " + workflowName);
            return;
        }
    },

    disconnectUser: function(proactiveUrl, sessionId) {

        var response = this.outboundRestService.executeOutboundRestMsg(proactiveUrl, sessionId, 'Disconnect', {});

        if (response.getStatusCode() == 204) {
            gs.info('Sucessfully terminated session ' + sessionId + ' from ProActive');
        } else {
            gs.error('An error occured trying to disconnect user from ProActive' + response.getBody());
        }
    },

    getJobInfo: function(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jobId) {

        if (jobId == undefined) {
            gs.error('jobId is empty, could not fetch ProActive Job info');
            return;
        };

        var parameters = {
            'job_id': jobId
        };

        var response = this.outboundRestService.executeOutboundRestMsg(proactiveUrl, sessionId, 'Get job info', parameters);

        if (response.getStatusCode() != 200) {
            gs.error('Could not retrieve job info for job ' + jobId + ' \nResponse code: ' + response.getStatusCode + '\nMessage: ' + response.getBody());
            return;
        }

        //gs.info('getJobInfo = ' + JSON.stringify(response.getBody()));
        return JSON.parse(response.getBody());
    },

    isFaultyJob: function(sessionId, jobId) {
        var jobInfo = getJobInfo(sessionId, jobId);
        var jobStatus = jobInfo.status;
        var numberOfFailedTasks = jobInfo.numberOfFailedTasks;
        var numberOfFaultyTasks = jobInfo.numberOfFaultyTasks;
        var numberOfInErrorTasks = jobInfo.numberOfInErrorTasks;

        var isFaultyJob = (jobStatus == 'FINISHED' || jobStatus == 'CANCELED' || jobStatus == "FAILED") &&
            ((numberOfFailedTasks + numberOfFailedTasks + numberOfFailedTasks) > 0);

        return isFaultyJob;
    },

    waitForTerminalStatus: function(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jobId) {
		if (!proactiveUrl) {
			gs.error("Can't get jobInfo without specifying the proactive url");
			return;
		}
		if (!sessionId) {
			gs.error("Can't get jobInfo without a sessionId");
			return;
		}
		if (!jobId) {
			gs.info("Can't get jobInfo without a sessionId");
			return;
		}
		

		// 24h timeout for requests, in milliseconds
		var timeout = 86400000;

		var jobStatuses = this._getAllJobStatuses();
		var date = new Date();
		var currentTime = date.getTime();
		var stopTime = currentTime + timeout;
		var currentJobInfo = this.getJobInfo(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jobId);
		var count = 0;
		gs.info('=== waitForTerminalStatus ===\n Inital jobInfo: ' + currentJobInfo);
		// Loop until the job is in a terminal status
		while (jobStatuses[currentJobInfo.status] && currentTime < stopTime) {
			count++;
			currentJobInfo = this.getJobInfo(proactiveUrl, sessionId, jobId);
			currentTime = new Date().getTime();
			gs.info('Loop n: ' + count + '\n currentJobInfo: ' + JSON.stringify(currentJobInfo));
			this.jobRepository.updateSubmittedJob(sessionId, currentJobInfo);
			this.threadUtils.sleep(2500);
		}
		this.jobRepository.updateSubmittedJob(sessionId, currentJobInfo);
		return currentJobInfo;
    },

    // Returns all possible job statuses in ProActive and if it is an alive state
    _getAllJobStatuses: function() {
        return {
            'PENDING': true,
            'RUNNING': true,
            'STALLED': true,
            'FINISHED': false,
            'PAUSED': true,
            'CANCELED': false,
            'FAILED': false,
            'KILLED': false,
            'IN_ERROR': true
        };
    },

    type: 'SchedulerClient'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 16:34:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe2508062f4270103c5d9facf699b647</sys_id><sys_mod_count>138</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SchedulerClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fe2508062f4270103c5d9facf699b647</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-05 01:44:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_13aaafb22f3730103c5d9facf699b6e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_661207_proacti_0.HibernationPreventer</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Prevent PDI to go in hbernation by creating and deleting a table</description><name>HibernationPreventer</name><script><![CDATA[var HibernationPreventer = Class.create();
HibernationPreventer.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.tableName = 'temptable';
		this.extendsTable = 'task';
		this.fname = 'tempField';
    },
	
	preventHibernation: function() {
		gs.info('Process to keep PDI alive started ...');
		this._createTable();
		// Sleep a bit so that system has time to create table
		gs.sleep(2500);
		this._deleteTable();
	},

	_createTable: function() {
		var ca = new GlideColumnAttributes(this.fname);  
		ca.setType("string");  
		ca.setUsePrefix(false);

		var attrs = {}; 
		attrs[this.fname] = ca;

		var tc = new GlideTableCreator(this.tableName , this.tableName);  
		tc.setColumnAttributes(attrs);  
		tc.setExtends(this.extendsTable);  
		tc.update();
		gs.info('Created Table '+this.tableName);
	},
	
	_deleteTable: function() {
		var table = new global.TableUtils(this.tableName);
		if (table.tableExists()) {
			// Drop created table
			gs.dropTable(this.tableName);
			gs.info('Deleted Table '+this.tableName);
		} else {
			gs.info('Table '+this.tableName+' does not exist thus cannot be deleted');
		}	
	},

    type: 'HibernationPreventer'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-17 15:45:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>13aaafb22f3730103c5d9facf699b6e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HibernationPreventer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling" source="x_661207_proacti_0">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ProActive Workflows & Scheduling">073851e22fe130103c5d9facf699b6d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_13aaafb22f3730103c5d9facf699b6e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-17 15:50:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
